TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object
public ref class DataFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组预定义数据格式名，可用于标识剪贴板或拖放操作中可用的数据格式。

span.span: Provides a set of predefined data format names that can be used to identify data formats available in the clipboard or drag-and-drop operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和实现接口的其他类 使用定义的静态格式 来描述数据对象中存储的每个数据格式。The class and other classes that implement the interface use the static formats defined by to describe each data format that is stored in a data object. 数据对象通常用于将数据传入和传出系统剪贴板以及拖放操作。Data objects are typically used for transferring data to and from the system clipboard, and in drag-and-drop operations. 下表列出了提供的静态数据格式字段的值 。The following table lists the values of the static data format fields provided by . 这些字段值仅用于提供信息，通常，代码应始终引用适当的字段，而不是硬编码的字符串。These field values are provided for informational purposes only; in general, code should always refer to the appropriate field, rather than hard-coded strings. |字段Field|字段值Field Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------|-----------------| ||图"Bitmap"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 位图数据格式。Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.| ||.CSV"CSV"|指定以逗号分隔的值 (CSV) 数据格式。Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.| ||"DeviceIndependentBitmap""DeviceIndependentBitmap"|指定与设备无关的位图 (DIB) 数据格式。Specifies the device-independent bitmap (DIB) data format.| ||"DataInterchangeFormat""DataInterchangeFormat"|指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF) 数据格式。Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.| ||"EnhancedMetafile""EnhancedMetafile"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 增强型图元文件格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.| ||FileDrop"FileDrop"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 文件放置格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.| ||"HTML 格式""HTML Format"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.| ||本地"Locale"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 区域设置（区域性）数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] locale (culture) data format.| ||"MetaFilePict""MetaFilePict"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 图元文件图片数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.| ||"OEMText""OEMText"|指定标准 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM 文本数据格式。Specifies the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM text data format.| ||调板"Palette"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 调色板数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] palette data format.| ||"PenData""PenData"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 钢笔数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] pen data format.| ||"RiffAudio""RiffAudio"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音频数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.| ||"Rtf 格式""Rich Text Format"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.| ||"PersistentObject""PersistentObject"|指定封装任何类型的可序列化数据对象的数据格式。Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.| ||"System.String""System.String"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 字符串类数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] string class data format.| ||SymbolicLink"SymbolicLink"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符号链接数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.| ||"文本""Text"|指定 ANSI 文本数据格式。Specifies the ANSI text data format.| ||"TaggedImageFileFormat""TaggedImageFileFormat"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.| ||"UnicodeText""UnicodeText"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文本数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.| ||WaveAudio"WaveAudio"|指定波形音频数据格式。Specifies the wave audio data format.| ||Xaml"Xaml"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.| ||"XamlPackage""XamlPackage"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 包数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] package data format.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 位图数据格式。

span.span: Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图将计算机图形表示为内存中的位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的特性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CommaSeparatedValue As String

summary.span: 指定以逗号分隔的值 (CSV) 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式是电子表格通常使用的基本交换格式。This format is a basic interchange format commonly used by spreadsheets. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 DIB 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the DIB data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是一种文件格式，旨在确保使用一个应用程序创建的位图图形可以在其他应用程序中加载和显示，就像它们在原始应用程序中出现的方式一样。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF) 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIF 是 ASCII 代码的一种格式，在该格式中，可以构造数据库、电子表格和类似的文档，以方便使用和传输到其他程序。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 增强型图元文件格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增强型图元文件格式是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 以图形对象而不是像素来存储图像的文件。The enhanced metafile format is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 调整大小时，图元文件会保持图像比位图更好。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 文件放置格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此格式可在拖放操作过程中与 shell 文件拖动交互。Use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式返回定义名称和数字 ID 的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可用于注册新格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，则自动将其注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormat

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: id
param.span: 为其请求 对象的数据格式的数字 ID。

span.span: The numeric ID of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式返回定义名称和数字 ID 的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所需的数据格式由数字 ID 指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by numeric ID.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含请求的数据格式的数字 ID 和名称。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可用于注册新格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，则自动将其注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可用于注册新格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，则自动将其注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format. 使用此方法要求调用 方具有 Use of this method requires that the caller have with the 标记集。flag set. 下面的代码演示了用于为程序集请求此权限的特性语法。The following code shows the attribute syntax to request this permission for an assembly. ```csharp [assembly: SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.RequestMinimum, Flags = UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard)] ``` ```vb ```

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 图元文件图片数据格式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件图片格式是一个 Windows 文件，它以图形对象而不是像素来存储图像。The metafile picture format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 调整大小时，图元文件会保持图像比位图更好。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 钢笔数据由手写软件的笔笔划组成。pen data consists of pen strokes for handwriting software. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Riff As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音频数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_riff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-riff-md.md)] 是一种基于广泛的规范，设计用于为不同类型的多媒体文件定义标准格式。is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Rtf As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 是用于在应用程序之间传输格式化文本文档的文档内容体系结构的改写。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Serializable As String

summary.span: 指定封装任何类型的可序列化数据对象的数据格式。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符号链接数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符号链接是一个磁盘目录项，它取代了文件的目录条目，但实际上是对其他目录中的文件的引用。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符号链接也可以引用别名、快捷方式、软链接或符号链接。A symbolic link may also be referred to an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tiff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-tiff-md.md)] 是一种标准文件格式，通常用于扫描、存储和交换灰度图形图像。is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UnicodeText As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文本数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据格式表示16位字符编码的 Unicode （也称为 UTF-16）和 UCS-2。This data format denotes 16-bit character encoded Unicode, also referred to as UTF-16, and UCS-2. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Xaml As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 是一种基于 XML 的语言，用于表示对象的树。XAML is an XML-based language used to represent a tree of objects. 可以使用任何编程语言来处理这些对象生成的事件 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 。Events generated by these objects can be handled using any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] programming language. 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] ， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 通常用于描述用户界面 (UI) 、文档和媒体体验。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is typically used to describe user interfaces (UI), documents, and media experiences. 该类和实现接口的其他类使用此字段 来描述可用的数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 将此字段与方法一起使用 可向数据对象添加具有相应格式的数据; 将此字段与方法一起使用 可检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含采用此格式的数据，请使用 方法来查询格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.
